what: Tools to help programmatic compilation of Quarto books
title: Tools to help programmatic compilation of Quarto books
text: goal autoquarto provide tools allow programmatic, incremental definition publication Quarto reports. autoquarto much work progress, developed parallel rbqmR package. rbqmR evolves, autoquarto.

title: Tools to help programmatic compilation of Quarto books
text: can install development version autoquarto GitHub : autoquarto currently available CRAN.

title: Tools to help programmatic compilation of Quarto books
text: fundamental object used S4 QuartoObject class, two subclasses , QuartoBook QuartoWebsite currently defined. , testing started QuartoBook. QuartoObject class 4 slots, named templateSearchPath, variables, chapters type. chapters slot contains names files define chapters, sections, report. file defines single chapter. chapter form <filename>.<extension>, example introduction.qmd, folders defined templateSearchPath searched, order, first matching file used. process allows hierarchy templates used. chapter file provided absolute relative path, templateSearchPath used. file used file precise location given. templateSearchPath slot lists folders searched, order, find chapter files. variables slot used pass parameters chapter files future version autoquarto. currently used. type slot defines type quarto object (eg book website) built. value set, internally, object’s constructor.

title: Tools to help programmatic compilation of Quarto books
text: Suppose company provides global templates components reports folder named ~/templates/gobal. global templates named index.qmd, conclusion.qmd environment.qmd. project team created project specific templates named conclusion.qmd, main_body.qmd intro.qmd folder named ~/templates/projectA/. project team running study named study1 provided study specific version intro.qmd ~/templates/projectA/study1. default, global template used. However, project-level version template provided, used instead global version. Similarly, study-level template override global project-level template. situation can handled setting templateSearchPath slot chapters slot value index.qmd taken ~/templates/gobal intro.qmd taken ~/templates/projectA/study1 main_body.qmd taken ~/templates/projectA/ conclusion.qmd taken ~/templates/projectA/ environment.qmd taken environment.qmd ~/specialReports/appendix3.qmd used

title: Tools to help programmatic compilation of Quarto books
text: autoquarto defines constructors QuartoBook QuartoWebsite classes. simplest use constructor templateSearchPath chapter slots can set calling constructor initial creation object, entries can added slot addTemplateSearchPath addChapter methods. QuartoObject methods support piping. two statements equivalent default, addXXXXmethods add new entries end current list, .parameter can used insert new entry different position list: Existing elements list can deleted appropriate removeXXXX method. following code returns myBook initial state:
code: myBook <- QuartoBook() myBook <- QuartoBook(             templateSeachPath = list("~/templates/projectA/study1", "~/templates/projectA/", "~/templates/gobal"),             chapters=list("index.qmd", "body.qmd", "conclusion.qmd")           ) myBook <- addTemplateSearchPath(x, "~/templates/gobal") myBook <- addChapter("environment.qmd") library(magrittr)  myBook <- myBook %>%              addTemplateSearchPath(x, "~/templates/gobal") %>%              addChapter("environment.qmd") myBook <- myBook %>% addChapter("~/specialReports/appendix3.qmd", .after=2) myBook <- myBook %>%              removeTemplateSearchPath(x, "~/templates/gobal") %>%              removeChapter("environment.qmd") %>%              removeChapter("~/specialReports/appendix3.qmd")

title: Tools to help programmatic compilation of Quarto books
text: methods discussed added necessary information QuartoObject, can published calling publish method. publishing QuartoObject also creates log file (default, folder outFile) describing actions taken publish method. log file base name outFile timestamp appended. example, code , log file might named testReport_2023-02 Feb-10_143122.log. detail format messages log file can controlled using standard calls futile.logger functions, example; content typical log file similar

QuartoObject

title: Tools to help programmatic compilation of Quarto books
text: Unfortunately, Quarto support YAML parameters multi-file renders currently great. way create “central” definition YAML parameters. Instead, YAML parameters must repeated start every chapter file. See details. addition, chapter file passed params list contains one entries exist file’s YAML header, error occurs. autoquarto handles situation using pre-render parameter quarto_render create modify chapter file’s YAML header includes parameters defined calling QuartoObject. Finally, another issue chapter file rendered environment. means intermediate results derived earlier chapter available current chapter, unless derivation repeated new parameters enabling derived data imported provided.

title: Tools to help programmatic compilation of Quarto books
text: report must include index.qmd file. limitation Quarto. See information. output-file affects single-file destinations PDF. ignored multi-file destinations html. multi-file destinations, project main file always (eg) index.html.

title: Tools to help programmatic compilation of Quarto books
text: Support parameters Provide support Parts Implement support bibliographies Implement support book- website-specific features Improve test coverage Provide getters (setters) class clots
